metadata.name: UNrevealed PharcydeNFT
metadata.description: The Bizzare Ride II the Pharcyde 30th Anniversary NFT collection allows collectors to own a piece of music history by owning a unique collectable moment from the Bizzare Ride II the Pharcyde 30th Anniversary Tour 2022. The NFT collection is comprised of photographs and video sequences shot on tour from each city by photographer, Brian Carano. The NFTs are hand drawn and animated by artist and designer, LilFreshSam, to capture the energy and vibe of the moment from each city on tour. The collection totals 242 NFTs, each one includes a utility factor that gives collectors an opportunity to meet the pharcyde. Please join us in celebrating the 30th anniversary of Bizzare Ride II the Pharcyde by owning your very own moment of hip hop history. Holders of the NFTs get a meet and greet from The Pharcyde.  We give special thanks to our fans that have been with us for over 30 years strong.  This one is for you. More special perks and exclusive unlocks for holders will be announced soon.
